name: Monkey .D. Garp
text: Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) Activate: Main Once Per Turn Place one card from your trash at the bottom of your deck: Give up to one of your opponent's characters cost-1 for the turn.
